info.description: API to retrieve the list of currencies that are available in the system including the buy and sell rate defined for each currency. Each currency is identified by its ISO currency code.
info.title: Currencies

get.description: Retrieves list of the Currencies (ISO 4217 codes) that are defined in the system

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: currencyIdNE
parameters.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

parameters.name: deviceId
parameters.description: Identifies the device type

parameters.name: userRole
parameters.description: User who initiated the transaction

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

markets.description: The currency market for which the currency rates applies to.

market.description: The currency market for which the currency rates applies to.

buyRate.description: The exchange rate at which is currency is bought.

sellRate.description: The exchange rate at which is currency is sold.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

id.description: The Identifier of the record created

uniqueIdentifier.description: The unique identifier/Message Reference of the record created.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

displayNames.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

displayName.description: Contains the name used for display or enrichment purposes

markets.description: The currency market for which the currency rates applies to.

market.description: The currency market for which the currency rates applies to.

buyRate.description: The exchange rate at which is currency is bought.

sellRate.description: The exchange rate at which is currency is sold.

midRate.description: Indicates the Mid rate for the currency pair. System derived if Rate type is choosen as Buy/Sell or User entered if Rate type Mid.Rate

defaultSpread.description: Indicates the amount to be added to/ subtracted from average revaluation rate to obtain the market buy/sell rates.

uptoSmallAmount.description: Defines the amount below which the System will apply the default Customer and Treasury Small Spreads

treasurySmallSpread.description: Defines the profit margin attributable to the dealers that will be used to calculate the tresaury buy or sell rate on any small value transactions.

customerSmallSpread.description: Defines the default spread rates required to calculate the customer buy or sell rate from the treasury buy or sell rate on any small value transactions

negotiableAmount.description: Defines the amount above which the exchange rate to be used must be obtained from the dealer.

treasuryMediumSpread.description: Defines the profit margin attributable to the dealers that will be used to calculate the tresaury buy or sell rate on any medium value transactions

customerMediumSpread.description: Defines the default spread rates required to calculate the customer buy or sell rate from the treasury buy or sell rate on any medium value transactions

revalrate.description: Specifies the alternative market rate for the Currency

treasuryLimitAmount.description: Specifies the treasury dealing limits of a currency

equivalentCurrencyId.description: Specifies an equivalent currency that can be used instead of the actual currency

rank.description: Indicates the rank of the payment order product within the group.

numberofDecimal.description: Indicates the applicable number of decimal positions for amount calculations and display purposes

quotationCode.description: Identifies the method of quotation of the exchange rate for the currency.

quotationPips.description: Identifies the decimal displacement of percentage in points for a currency.

noticeDay.description: Indicates the number of days prior to rollover or renewal date on which the notice to be sent.

nostroProjectionDay.description: Defines the number of working days forward, from the Run date, to commence detailed Nostro reporting.

interestDayBasis.description: Defines the method of calculation for accrued interest on a Security

allowedVariance.description: Defines the percentage variance allowed on the middle rate

fixedRateDate.description: Indicates the date of the rate fixing

minAmount.description: Contains the minimum principal amount defined for the deposit contract

cashOnlyRounding.description: Specifies whether rounding of amounts in this currency is to take place only for cash transactions.

minimumRoundType.description: Indicates the type of rounding to be applied for non-cash transactions of a currency.

cashRoundType.description: Indicates the type of rounding to be applied for cash transactions of a currency.

preciousMetal.description: Identifies if the currency is a precious metal or not.

countryCode.description: ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 or alpha-3 country code of financial institution

fixedRate.description: Numeric value for the interest rate entered manually.

fixedCurrencyId.description: Defines whether this currency is fixed to another currency

startDate.description: Contains the date on which the transaction or payment gets initiated.

baseCurrencyRank.description: Indicates the base currency used for  the currency conversion if primary conversions are not specified

availableDate.description: Specifies the date after which the contract or amount is available for use.

blockedDateTime.description: Date on which the account has been blocked.

cutOffTime.description: The Cut off time when all executions for the day are consolidated to create a trade

clsCurrencyId.description: identifies the Continuous Linked Settlement (CLS) currency used to eliminate the risk of foreign exchange rate settlement

code.description: The code related to override message.

options.description: The usable options for the override.

currencyMarketName.description: Specifies the name displayed for the currency market

spreadCalcuationRoutine.description: Specifies the name of the routine to be used for customised spread calculation.

currencyId.description: Identifier of the currency. This is the 3-letter ISO 4217 code of the currency.

modifiedDate.description: Date on which the Bundle has been modified.
